templates.name: Pause Detection
templates.template:
Given context: {context}
At timestamps {timestamps}, analyze pauses, intent, and turn-taking. Explain whether the pause is cognitive load, rhetorical effect, or handoff.

templates.name: Semantic Pivot
templates.template:
Context: {context}
Speaker A says: {utterance}. Identify subtext and recommend interviewer pivot or follow-up.
